proposals.description: A list of proposed modifications to files in the user's workspace.

file_name.description: The full path to the file being created/deleted/modified.

content.description: The full content of the file. This will be used as a drop-in replacement of the previous file content. DO NOT OMIT UNCHANGED CONTENT! Use an empty string if 'delete' is true.

delete.description: True if this file should be deleted. For simplicity, moving or renaming files should be handled as a new file creation + existing file deletion.

summary.description: A brief summary of the proposed changes. This text should have at most 50 characters, as it will be used as the first line in a git commit message.

description.description: A detailed description of the proposed changes. This text should have at most 72 characters per line (but no line limit), as it will be used as the detailed git commit message.
